string-array.name: card_colorless_desc
string-array.item: Gain 1 Intangible. Exhaust. Ethereal. (No longer ethereal)
Deal 15 damage. If this kills and enemy then permanently increase this card\'s damage by 3(5).
Enemy loses 9(15) Strength for the rest of this turn. Exhaust.
Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Draw 1(2) card(s)
Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust. (Don\'t Exhaust)
Innate. Deal 6(8) damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.
Reduce the cost of cards in your hand to 1 this turn(combat).
Place a card(any number of cards) from your hand on the bottom of your draw pile. It(They) costs 0 until played.
If you have no Attack cards in your hand, draw 2(3) cards.
Add 1(2) random Colorless card(s) to your hand. Exhaust.
A random card in your hand costs 0 for the rest of combat. Exhaust.
Innate. Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.
Gain 30(40) Block. You cannot gain Block from cards for the next 2 turns. Exhaust.
Choose and exhaust 3(5) cards in your hand. Exhaust.
Upgrade ALL of your cards for the rest of combat. Exhaust.
Add 3(5) random Skills into your Draw Pile. They cost 0 this combat. Exhaust.
Deal 20(25) damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain 20(25) Gold.
At the start of each turn, add a random colorless card to your hand.
At the start of your turn, play the top card of your draw pile.
Add 3(5) random Attacks into your Draw Pile. They cost 0 this combat. Exhaust.
Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn, deal 10(14) damage to ALL enemies.
Whenever you apply a Debuff to an enemy, they take 3(4) damage.
Choose a Skill from your draw pile and place it into your hand. Exhaust. (Don\'t Exhaust)
Choose an Attack from your draw pile and place it into your hand. Exhaust. (Don\'t Exhaust)
At the end of 3 turns, deal 30(40) damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 2 cards. Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust. (Don\'t Exhaust)
Add X random (Upgraded) colorless cards into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Place 3(4) random Attack card from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
